root.name: Truth or Lies
root.description: GameplayThe game operates as a lie detector with two game modes. Standard and Hot Seat. StandardIn standard each person will receive between three and eight questions per round depending on the game length selected, short, normal or long. There are three rounds and winning each round or game is based on your "truth" answers. The game only awards points for answers it believes are true. You can still get points for answers it deems a lie but only a small fraction of the 1000 possible per question. Questions are themed based on the following categories chosen at the beginning of the game. KidsTeensAdultsCouplesFamilies Hot Seat In Hot Seat a person in the room can ask the question and then the player answers into the microphone. The game just acts like a lie detector in this mode and no points are awarded. Each round of Hot Seat is three questions.Achievement PointsTruth or Lies was voted the 2010 Easiest Overall 1000 Points by xbox360achievements.org
